title: My pixel 2 fell on its back and I have a black screen. I can touch the sensor and it vibrates so I think it works still but just black screen.
content: My google pixel 2 fell on its back from my pocket and the screen immediately went black. I can till press screen and feel it working but nothing displays. I tried plugging it in to computer but it wonâ€™t read and also factory reset nothing works.
